title: Option to Have Champion Names in Place of Usernames Above Health Bars
body:
Just for the record, I'm colourblind and have colourblind mode on, but with all the different skins in the game I can't tell some champions apart quickly. For example, if I'm in a game and multiple of my opponents are using mecha kingdom skins, it takes me a few seconds to distinguish which champion they're playing. This isn't exclusive to those skins either, I have had previous issues where I have misjudged what champion someone was using due to their skin (I've gotten one of {{champion:64}}  skins mixed up with one of {{champion:98}} ).

The simple fix for this problem is to have an option in the settings to show, instead of Summoner names above the health bar, the champion name. Of course with the ability to still see their username when looking at the scoreboard.

And clarity of skins is the least of the problems one has to overcome to get good at League.
